title: Medal.of.Honor.Anthology-R.G.Mechanics
description:
Medal.of.Honor.Anthology-R.G.Mechanics





Medal of Honor Allied Assault - Complete Edition


Game information:

Medal of Honor Allied Assault

Dilapidated buildings, bullets, watering all around like a summer
downpour, wounded soldiers, begging for help, the howling of
bombers, grenade explosions, the roar of guns and the chatter
of machine-gun bursts - in this incredibly atmospheric game
you immerse yourself in a very realistic world of the Second
World War. Named dozens of gaming publications as "Best fighter
in 2002", Allied Assault gives you the ability to see through
the eyes of the Second World leytinanta Allied troops, as fate
took part in the most important battles of the war.

Medal of Honor Allied Assault: Spearhead

This is the official addition to one of the most popular games
on the events of World War II - the game Medal of Honor: Allied
Assault, as critics say, the quality of design, variety of tasks
and emotional tension far exceeds even triumphant original.
In the game with the maximum historical accuracy of events
displayed the final episodes of the war, and it ends with a
grand battle for Berlin.

Medal of Honor Allied Assault: Breakthrough

Official addition Medal of Honor Allied Assult Breakthrough open for you one
step of the Second World War - the theater of military operations in southern
Europe and northern Africa. 11 single-player levels, 9 maps for multiplayer,
new weapons, and, of course, improvements in gameplay. Now you can drive a tank,
indicate the purpose of a Union artillery defuse the minefields, and to test
a new type of collective competition Liberation.


Repack Features:

Medal of Honor Allied Assault

Game Version - v1.11
Do not cut / recoded
Includes crack text from ZoG v1.05

Medal of Honor Pacific Assault


Game information:

The game is dedicated to the Second World War, namely the fighting against
the Japanese fleet in the Pacific. Your character will be Tom Conlin,
Private, U.S. Marine Corps. Action game begins with the bloody battle
of Tarawa atoll, then you have to go back in time and step by
step through the entire Pacific campaign.

Game Features:

Exclusive light machine gun as one of the shafts in the game.
Holder of the regular version will not see it.
WWII Timeline Presentation - historical facts and information
on which is built or that mission in the game.
In-Game Music with Commentary - the entire soundtrack MoHPA
with comments of its author, Eric Kreybera.
Medal of Honor: Paths of Glory - interviews with veterans
of fighting in the Pacific theater of operations during
World War II.
Silent Drill Platoon - demonstrations eponymous squad.
The Thought War - movie about the various promotional
tricks that were used on both sides of the front.
Making of the Game - video about how to make a game.
Intro Movies with Commentary - all the videos from
the game with a director's commentary Brady Bell.
Pop-up facts-Ã‚Â«pop" during the game interesting
facts. Very informative.

Repack Features:

Medal of Honor Pacific Assault
Version of the game - v1.2
Do not cut / recoded

Medal of Honor Airborne


Game information:

Game by your rules! Each task can be done in different ways!
Be smarter and luckier enemy, because of the success depends
not only your life, but the whole operation!
Count to three and pull the ring! Each mission begins with the
landing. During the flight, you can not just look at the sides,
but also to control a parachute!
Best weapon of war! In your hands the most devastating firearm
during the Second World War. All pistols, submachine guns and
rifles have a real live performance!
Shooting in the top ten! Gradually weapon skills improve.
Train and eventually become a real sniper!
Nastoschyaie actors play soldiers! Drawing a new generation
will maximize realism. Soldiers like real people and the world
around us - on the documentary footage.
Believe what is happening is very easy!

Repack Features:

Medal of Honor Airborne
Version of the game - v1.3
Do not cut / recoded

Medal of Honor


Game information:

These soldiers have no equal. They are - professionals - the
best of the best. How many of them - is not precisely known,
but hardly more than a few hundred. They report directly to
the command of U.S. forces. They are referred to only in the
hottest point and assign tasks to successfully execute that
beyond the power of anyone else. They - the elite soldiers
of Tier 1 Operators. Introduced in Medal of Honor single
player campaign was developed in close cooperation with the
veterans and current members of Tier 1 division. It is
based on real events, which told the participants. It is
thanks to these people the authors Medal of Honor could
accurately recreate the atmosphere of modern war. In the
role of elite soldier Tier 1, consisting of one division
of the U.S. army the player will fight against the forces
of "Taliban" and "Al Qaeda" in the harsh Afghan soil.
Multiplayer mode Medal of Honor designed by world famous
studio DICE, which created the famous series Battlefield.
In these brutal battles, each player will have to fight
for survival, relying only on their own.

Repack Features:

Medal of Honor
Version of the game - v1.0.75.0
Do not cut / recoded
Additions:
Limited Edition

Medal of Honor Warfighter


Game information:

Medal of Honor Warfighter - aggressive, tough, realistic game,
in which you take on the role of a soldier of one of the elite
units of the U.S. Army. In developing the script participated
operatives acting like special squad. Medal of Honor Warfighter
reveals the truth about modern war and the fight against global
terrorism.
Medal of Honor Warfighter continues the tradition of which was
published in 2010 the game Medal of Honor, which is the first
in the history of the series unfolds not in the days of World
War II, and in our days. Events new game takes place outside
Afghanistan. Global counter-terrorist operation carried out
in the real world "hot spots" of the planet, and in multiplayer
battles you have to fight with soldiers from different countries.
In Medal of Honor Warfighter tells of a U.S. Army soldier nicknamed
Preacher. Returning home, the preacher finds that his marriage on
the verge of collapse. Hero tries to mend relations with his wife
and family back, for which he fought and bled. But his plans to
live in peace will not come true. Country faces a new danger:
the terrorists manage to smuggle across the border is extremely
powerful explosive - PETN. Preacher and his comrades should go
straight into the lair of the enemy and to do everything
in their power to protect loved ones.

Repack Features:

Medal of Honor Warfighter
Version of the game - v1.0.0.3
Do not cut / recoded
